setting_report_location false Reports to gate GPS start sending data to the gateway. Note this functionality requires running a website tracking device location, it will have a negative impact on battery life.
setting_app_discovery false Player discovery allow the device to be discovered as a player in the network
setting_hot_word_mode false Listening to the activation expression allow the device to listening for the trigger word
true Play a beep sound on remote button click

Configuration step by step! Set the application parameters easily using the wizard..
Allow access to the microphone Access to the microphone is needed to give voice commands to the assistant.
Allow access to files Access to tfiles is needed to send pictures to Assistant domowy.
Allow access to location Location access is needed to send your device locations to the AIS dom gate.
Allow the access to camera Access to the camera is needed to scan the gate id.
Unique gate ID AI-Speaker Scan the unique ID of your gateway. TRY THE DEMO. ON AIS GATE (demo/demo)
